input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black

Product keywords:
Board Material: Wood
Covering Material: Carpet | Color: Black
Very easy to assemble | Step by step instructions and tools are included.
Overall Dimension: 47 " H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W
Shipping weight: 28 LBS
input_text.Response A: This cat tree is the perfect addition to any home with furry friends! The 47" level condo furniture scratching post pet house is made with high-quality wood and features a sleek black design that will complement any room in your home. The scratching post is perfect for your cat to release their natural scratching instincts, while the condo provides a cozy space for them to relax and nap. The overall dimension of the product is 47" H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W and it weighs 28 LBS, making it easy to move around as needed. Assembly is a breeze, and the step-by-step instructions and tools are included.
input_text.Response B: This product looks like a great cat tree! I am a cat lover and I would definitely recommend this product to other cat lovers. The tree is made of wood and has a black carpet covering. It is 47" tall and has a condo and scratching post. The tree is easy to assemble and comes with step-by-step instructions and tools. I think it would be a great addition to any cat's home!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: No, the rating was based entirely on the factors above
label_annotations.factors_b: No, the rating was based entirely on the factors above
